#Example: Large parts of Africa and south east Asia
tropical = { 
	# Southwest Africa

normal_winter = { 
	# Scandinavia
	1 2 3 4 5 7 8 9 16 17
	22 23 24 25 27 28 29 34 35 36

	4164 4166 40 41 42 43 45 46 47 48
	767 770 771 2993 2994 2995 2996 49 50 51

	65 70 71 72 74 75 77 79 80 81

#Example: Russia & Lappland
severe_winter = { 
	# Scandinavia
	10 11 18 19 20 21 30 31 32 33
	2752 4113 4114 4122 4124 4129 4146 4151 4152 1978
	1979 73 110 165 166 1768 1869 1870 1873 4710
	132 4759 4758 76 210 211 2987 293 294 295
	296 297 298 299 300 301 302 303 304 305
	306 307 308 309 310 311 312 313 314 315
	1752 1753 1754 1755 1776 1777 1778 2408 2102 2103

mild_monsoon = { 
	2026 4415 4416 4408 4407 2100 4409 538 2085 4414
	539 540 1947 2027 4417 2083 4418 4419 4420 533
	2031 4421 4422 4426 541 1949 2090 4423 4424 532

equator_y_on_province_image = 656
